programme.title: MLS Soccer
programme.sub-title: New York City FC at New England Revolution
programme.desc: The Revolution (2-4-1) face New York City FC (3-3-2). New England has won two of its last three despite not scoring a goal from open play, using two penalties and a free kick. NYCFC topped the Revs 2-1 on March 15 on Alonso Martínez's go-ahead tally.

programme.title: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Manchester City and Aston Villa square off in a match with potential Champions League implications. Villa, which was knocked out of Europe's premier competition by Paris Saint-Germain on April 15, bested Man City 2-1 on Dec. 21, 2024, at Villa Park.
